headline: Trump Trade: Fannie, Freddie ordered to explore crypto as federal mortgage asset
summary: Catch up on the top industries and stocks that were impacted, or were predicted to be impacted, by the comments, actions and policies of President Trump with this daily recap compiled by The Fly: CRYPTO AS FEDERAL MORTGAGE ASSET: FHFA Director William Pulte has ordered Fannie Mae (FNMA) and Freddie Mac (FMCC) to explore crypto as an asset for single-family mortgage applications without converting it to U.S. dollars, CNBC’s MacKenzie Sigalos reports. headline: US Allies Wary of Buying American as They Plan Defense Buildup
summary: (Bloomberg) -- For European countries that just approved the biggest increase in military spending in decades, “Buy American” is looking a lot less appealing than it once was. They may have no choice.As the allies rush to rebuild their fighting forces, leaders are confronting the reality that they’ll have to rely on the US for many of the new weapons they’re planning to buy, a sales pitch driven home by President Donald Trump on his visit to Europe this week.They fret that they may be put at gre
